column4: when i am use the command line "wget -i" i should write the filename after the i without space ? like this "wget -iLINKS.TXT" ?
i made bash script of download links "wget -i links01.txt" .. "wget -ilinks02.txt" and i want the bash script will wait 30 secs between the commands some know how 2 do that ?
yes on bash sleep 30 will do that.
